sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Box, Typography, Grid } from "@mui/material";

const AboutUs = () => {
  return (
    <Box width="80%" m="80px auto">
      <Grid container spacing={6} alignItems="center">
        {/* Foto personal */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={5} lg={6}>
          <Box
            component="img"
            alt="Pablo portrait"
            src="/images/aboutus-photo.jpg"
            sx={{
              width: "100%",
              height: "auto",
              maxHeight: { lg: "700px", xl: "700px" },
              objectFit: "contain",
              borderRadius: "8px",
              mx: "auto",
              display: "block",
            }}
          />
        </Grid>

        {/* Biografía */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={7} lg={6}>
          <Typography variant="h3" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
            About Us
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            Hi, I’m Pablo. Music has been my compass, guiding me through
            various roles—from sound designer and vinyl collector to building
            communities on platforms like Allmyrecords and Discogs. Over time,
            I merged this passion with technology, transitioning into web
            development and front-end design.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            This project is more than just an e-commerce demo—it’s a space
            where my two worlds meet: the love for vinyl records and the
            creative possibilities of coding. Every detail you see here is
            guided by the idea of making music discovery and collecting
            meaningful, simple, and inspiring.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            Beyond music, I have a deep appreciation for cinema, photography,
            and other forms of art. These interests influence my approach to
            design and user experience, striving to create interfaces that are
            not only functional but visually engaging and intuitive.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            My journey in web development has allowed me to merge creativity
            with technical skills, mastering tools like React, JavaScript,
            TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS. I enjoy building projects that are
            visually appealing, performant, and user-friendly, especially when
            they serve communities that share my passions.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2, lineHeight: 1.6 }}>
            Thanks for stopping by and sharing a piece of this journey. Whether
            you’re a passionate collector, a music lover, or simply curious
            about technology, I hope you enjoy exploring this project as much
            as I enjoyed creating it.
          </Typography>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default AboutUs;
